musical.translation[0].definitions[0].de: relating to music or consisting of music
musical.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a musical version of the fairy tale ‘Cinderella’
When he began his musical career, King played only for black audiences.
musical.translation[0].definitions[1].de: good at or interested in playing or singing music
musical.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She’s very musical and loves to sing.
musical.translation[0].definitions[2].de: having a pleasant sound like music
musical.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a play or film that includes singing and dancing
musical.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Webber had three musicals playing in London at one time.
Carroll appeared in a number of Broadway musicals.
